## Description {#details}

Wrapper to model the analysis pass concept.

Can wrap any type which implements a suitable <code>run</code> method. The method must accept an <code>IRUnitT&amp;</code> and an <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/analysismanager">AnalysisManager&lt;IRUnitT&gt;</a>&amp;</code> as arguments and produce an object which can be wrapped in a <code><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/detail/analysisresultmodel">AnalysisResultModel</a></code>.

Definition at line 292 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/passmanagerinternal-h">PassManagerInternal.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### name() {#a39849dba8f55d3050df4bbded264f4b2}

  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
The model delegates to a static <code>PassT::name</code> method.

The returned string ref must point to constant immutable data!

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/passmanagerinternal-h/#l00327">327</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/passmanagerinternal-h">PassManagerInternal.h</a>.

<MemberDefinition

The return is wrapped in an <code><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/detail/analysisresultmodel">AnalysisResultModel</a></code>.
